title: Stabilize server & collectors: health endpoints + auto-disable
body:
Deliverables:
- Add server health endpoint `/health` and `/api/status`.
- Implement collector auto-disable after configurable consecutive errors.
- Expose collector health metrics/logging.
- Add unit tests for the `BaseCollector` error/circuit logic.

References: docs/prd/PRD-world-pulse.md, src/server/collectors/base.ts
